metadata.title: CVE-2024-4767 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: If the `browser.privatebrowsing.autostart` preference is enabled, IndexedDBfiles were not properly deleted when the window was closed. This preferenceis disabled by default in Firefox. This vulnerability affects Firefox <126, Firefox ESR < 115.11, and Thunderbird < 115.11.

criterions.comment: mozjs102 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
